h the default make 
and configure files on my os X (10.4) machine.

 run configure I get 
----------
checking for matlab... none
---------
and =
this cascades throughout the make and make install so no matlab/cantera int=
erface is 
built.

 are there any recommedations on 
what to set it to?  
Has anyone else succ=
essfully build the matlab/cantera files on a mac?

 and all help!
